CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(CLM_Question__r.CLM_L2DTrigger__c, "No"), HYPERLINK("/apex/CLM_L2DTriggerPage?L2DType=NonL2d&id="&Id&"&TrgId="&CLM_Question__c&"&AgrmntId="&Apttus__Agreement__c, IMAGE("/resource/CLM_L2D_Answers", "L2D Answers"), "_self"), IF (ISPICKVAL(CLM_Question__r.CLM_L2DTrigger__c, "Yes"), HYPERLINK("/apex/CLM_L2DTriggerPage?L2DType=L2d&id="&Id&"&TrgId="&CLM_Question__c&"&AgrmntId="&Apttus__Agreement__c, IMAGE("/resource/CLM_L2D_Answers", "L2D Answers"), "_self") ,null))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: View a list of Answers associated with the L2D Trigger or Enter an Answer if this is a Non-L2D Trigger
CustomField.label: Possible Answers
